messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Update the phone number of the last person I sent a message to to +10293847563
I can help with that. Which contact would you like me to update—what’s the name or person ID of the last person you messaged?
I’ll need to know which contact to update—could you tell me their name (or any other detail, like a relationship or person ID) so I can locate the right entry?
I really don't have any more details, sorry.
I understand. If you’re not sure who that last message went to, would you like me to list your current contacts so you can pick which one to update?

messages.name: search_contacts
messages.content: ValueError: No search criteria are given. At least one search criteria should be provided among ('person_id', 'name', 'phone_number', 'relationship', 'is_self')

• Their name  
• Their contact ID
